title: Large-Scale Course on Enhancing English Reading Comprehension Competencies Using Reflective Teaching Methods

context.prior_knowledge: Secondary-level English reading proficiency, no reflective practice experience
context.additional_context: Social sector job-linked English reading education for current practitioners. Strengthening real-world application competencies through project-based assessments in BYOD environments

learning_goals: Learners can self-directively improve English reading strategies by applying the four stages (Plan-Execute-Reflect-Evaluate) of the Reflective Teaching Model (RTMRC).
Learners can select and execute reading strategies (skimming, scanning, deep analysis) suited to text characteristics and reflect on the process.
Through project-based assessment, learners achieve over 80% practical problem-solving rates by applying reflective reading processes to social field data analysis.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
